content.en: Educational data mining: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms in educational data mining to analyze student performance and behavior. The K-means algorithm has been frequently employed to cluster students based on their performance in e-Learning environments and to derive new association rules for optimal learning sequences. Additionally, clustering algorithms like K-means have been used to classify students' answers and to provide personalized learning approaches in a learning management system. These data mining techniques aim to improve educational outcomes and predict student performance.
content.da: Uddannelsesdataminering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer i uddannelsesdataminering for at analysere studerendes præstationer og adfærd. K-means algoritmen er ofte blevet anvendt til at klynge studerende baseret på deres præstationer i e-læringsmiljøer og til at udlede nye associationsregler for optimale læringsforløb. Derudover er klyngealgoritmer som K-means blevet brugt til at klassificere studerendes svar og til at tilbyde personlige læringsmetoder i et learning management system. Disse datamineringsmetoder sigter mod at forbedre uddannelsesresultater og forudsige studerendes præstationer.
